content.rendered:
View Job Listings

We want you to have a great relocation experience..

A job impacts every aspect of our lives. We want the best fit for you, and our team is dedicated to helping you find it.

We keep the process simple.

From an easy, on-line application, to a low-pressure interview with our team, we’ve designed every step around you.

Our recruiters are the best.

Our recruiters are industry professionals with years of work experience in the fields we serve. They know what you need to be successful from day one.

We get to know you.

Our team will spend one-on-one time with you to understand what you need from your next job and pair you with the right opportunities.

We provide expert coaching and resources.

We will review your resume’, conduct mock interviews, and provide you with the tools to look your best for prospective employers.

We believe in communication.

Our team will keep you up to date on progress and provide valuable feedback before and after each interview to help you get hired.

View Our Google Reviews

Our Founders

Cory & Amber Minter

Cory and Amber Minter started Bridge Career because they believed candidates and companies deserved a better relocation experience. After working with staffing companies who wasted people’s time, they chose to build a company focused on finding the right people, for the right job, in the right way. From our easy application process to personalized site visits with our clients, everything at Bridge Career is shaped by the value we place on people and their time.

Common Questions

Call (918) 622-2588

Staff an employee, support our community

Our company culture is defined by the value we place on serving people. As a faith driven organization, we believe our responsibility as a company is bigger than the services we provide. Bridge Career invests a portion of all company revenue in local non-profits making a positive impact in our community.

Learn More
